faq.question: Why ticket reservation via online is not working for me anymore?
faq.answer: We regret that the online ticket reservation service is no longer available.

faq.question: For "Children" ticket , what is the age range?
faq.answer: Children aged from 4 to 12 years old based on Date of Birth.

faq.question: Can I enjoy the students rate with my student ID even I am an International University student?
faq.answer: Yes , please verify your identify by presenting your student ID at our counter.

faq.question: How long will a movie will be listed on GTV?
faq.answer: A movie will be listed at least for 3 weeks , depends on market demand

faq.question: My children are aged below 13 years old. Can I bring them to watch movie that are categorized as 'P13'?
faq.answer: Yes , children below 13 years old are allowed to watch with parent guidance.

faq.question: How long in advance do I need, in order to place a booking for a hall?
faq.answer: Required 2 weeks in advance. The selection of movie , location and date is following to availability.
